Adding a Representative’s Name and Address to Letters in VBMS Core
Follow the instructions in the table below to list the representative name and address to letters in VBMS Core.

Step
Action

Prior to finalizing the letter, preview it to ensure that the information populated correctly.

Important
:  Changing a representative this way only changes it for the purpose of the specific correspondence.  It will not change the appointed representative as listed in the corporate data base.
Reference
